description: This file is a configuration script for Vite, a build tool for frontend projects. It sets up development server options, plugins, environment loading, and project-specific behaviors aimed at CI/CD environments and containerized deployments.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines the Vite configuration with environment variables, plugins, server settings, and build options.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on current mode and project root.
